otherNightReminder: Ask them if they wish to choose a dead player. If they do tell them that players character and tell them an evil Potion they receive.
name: Druid
ability: Each night* you may choose a dead player; learn their character and receive an evil potion. [+0 or +1 Outsiders]
flavor: The great use of life is to spend it for something that will outlast it.
